channel.description: For Loop def main(): nums = [3, 1, 4, 1, 5, 9, 2] print("The first seven digits of pi are...") for i in nums: print(i) main() While Loop def main(): nums = [3, 1, 4, 1, 5, 9, 2] print("The first seven digits of pi are...") i = 0 while i < len(nums): print(nums[i]) i = i + 1 main()
